import React from 'react' import HeroBgAnimation from '../HeroBgAnimation' import { HeroContainer, HeroBg, HeroLeftContainer, Img, HeroRightContainer, HeroInnerContainer, TextLoop, Title, Span, SubTitle,SocialMediaIcons,SocialMediaIcon, ResumeButton } from './HeroStyle' import HeroImg from '../../images/dp.jpg' import Typewriter from 'typewriter-effect'; import { Bio } from '../../data/constants'; const HeroSection = () => { return (
Hi, I am <br /> {Bio.name} I am a {Bio.description} Check Resume
) } export default HeroSection
